ai_explanation.introduction_japanese: 「植える」は、庭や畑、公園などで植物を扱う場面や、物や考えを誰かに入れる・定着させる話をするときによく使う動詞です。学校や地域活動、農作業の会話でよく出ます。
ai_explanation.introduction_english: The verb うえる is commonly used in conversations about planting in gardens, fields, or parks, and also when talking about inserting or instilling things like ideas or objects.
meanings: to insert; to transplant; to implant; to set (type)
ai_explanation.meaning_explanation_japanese: 「植える」は、種や木、花などを土に入れて育て始めるときに使う言葉です。また、物をある場所に入れる、考えや価値観を人の心に入れて定着させるときにも使えます。
ai_explanation.meaning_explanation_english: The word うえる means to put seeds, trees, or flowers into the ground so they grow. It can also mean to place or transplant things into someplace, or to put an idea or value into someone's mind.
ai_explanation.kanji_explanation_english: The first kanji means plant. It shows the idea of putting living things into the ground to grow. For example, しょくぶつ is a word meaning plants, where this kanji gives the sense of living vegetation, and うえき is a word for ornamental plants or potted trees, where the kanji also carries the meaning of planting and plants.

common_words: 植物 (しょくぶつ): plant; vegetation
植木 (うえき): ornamental tree; potted plant

synonyms: 育てる : そだてる : nurture, raise, rear (plants, animals, children)
植え付ける : うえつける : plant, set (plants in the ground)
ai_explanation.synonyms_explanation: The most common synonyms of the word are そだてる and うえつける. そだてる focuses on caring for and raising something over time (nurture), while うえつける is very close to うえる and emphasizes the act of planting or setting plants in place.
antonyms: 抜く : ぬく : pull out, remove, extract (plants, objects)
ai_explanation.antonyms_explanation: The most common antonym of the word is ぬく. ぬく means to pull out or remove (for example pulling a plant out of the ground), which is the opposite action of planting.

translations.MY: သစ်ပင်စိုက်ပါ။

examples.furigana: 庭(にわ)に花(はな)を植(う)える。

translations.FR: Plantez des fleurs dans le jardin.
translations.TL: Magtanim ng mga bulaklak sa hardin.
translations.MY: ပန်းခြံထဲမှာ ပန်းပင်တွေစိုက်တယ်။

examples.furigana: 畑(はたけ)に野菜(やさい)を植(う)える。

translations.FR: Planter des légumes dans le champ.
translations.TL: Magtanim ng mga gulay sa bukid.
translations.MY: လယ်ထဲမှာ ဟင်းသီးဟင်းရွက်စိုက်တယ်။

examples.furigana: 鉢(はち)に苗(なえ)を植(う)える。

translations.FR: Plantez les semis dans des pots.
translations.TL: Itanim ang mga punla sa mga kaldero.

examples.kanji: 先生は子供の心に良い習慣を植える。
examples.furigana: 先生(せんせい)は子供(こども)の心(こころ)に良(よ)い習慣(しゅうかん)を植(う)える。

translations.EN: Teachers instill good habits in children's minds.
translations.ID: Guru menanamkan kebiasaan baik dalam pikiran anak-anak.
translations.ES: Los maestros inculcan buenos hábitos en las mentes de los niños.
translations.VI: Giáo viên là người truyền đạt những thói quen tốt vào tâm trí trẻ em.
translations.FR: Les enseignants inculquent de bonnes habitudes dans l’esprit des enfants.
translations.NE: शिक्षकहरूले बालबालिकाको दिमागमा असल बानीहरू बसाल्छन्।
translations.BN: শিক্ষকরা শিশুদের মনে ভালো অভ্যাস গড়ে তোলেন।
translations.ZH: 老师在孩子们心中灌输良好的习惯。
translations.KO: 박사는 아이의 마음에 좋은 습관을 심는다.
translations.TL: Ang mga guro ay nagtatanim ng magagandang gawi sa isipan ng mga bata.
translations.MY: ဆရာမများသည် ကလေးများ၏ စိတ်တွင် အလေ့အထကောင်းများ မွေးမြူကြသည်။
translations.HI: शिक्षक बच्चों के मन में अच्छी आदतें डालते हैं।
translations.AR: المعلمون يغرسون العادات الجيدة في عقول الأطفال.
translations.FA: معلمان عادت‌های خوب را در ذهن کودکان القا می‌کنند.

examples.kanji: 市民が公園に木を植える。
examples.furigana: 市民(しみん)が公園(こうえん)に木(き)を植(う)える。

translations.EN: Citizens plant trees in the park.
translations.ES: Los ciudadanos plantan árboles en el parque.
translations.VI: Người dân trồng cây trong công viên.
translations.FR: Les citoyens plantent des arbres dans le parc.
translations.TL: Nagtatanim ng mga puno ang mga mamamayan sa parke.
translations.MY: ပန်းခြံထဲမှာ လူတွေ သစ်ပင်စိုက်တယ်။
translations.HI: नागरिक पार्क में पेड़ लगाते हैं।

to insert; to transplant; to implant; to.ZH: 插入；移植；植入；设置（类型）

to inoculate (e.g. an infectious agent).MY: ပိုးသတ်ရန် (ဥပမာ- ကူးစက်နိုင်သော အေးဂျင့်)
